articles.description: Big players deliver the big moments to decide the big games and Arsenal's Declan Rice did that on every level against Manchester United, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: 'Big-moment player Rice delivers on every level'

articles.description: Max Verstappen fought to a record 10th consecutive F1 victory but Ferrari's best performance of 2023 made them the story at Monza, says Andrew Benson.
articles.title: 'Verstappen achievement momentous but Ferrari the story at Monza'

articles.description: England are outplayed by a resurgent New Zealand who clinch the third T20 international by 74 runs at Edgbaston.
articles.title: England thumped by New Zealand in third T20

articles.description: Match of the Day 2's Mark Chapman, Jermaine Jenas and Stephen Warnock discuss how Liverpool's Trent Alexander-Arnold delivered a "passing masterclass".
articles.title: MOTD2 analysis: How Alexander-Arnold gave a 'passing masterclass'

articles.description: Jadon Sancho says he is "a scapegoat" after Manchester United boss Erik ten Hag said he was dropped for Sunday's loss to Arsenal because of poor training performance.
articles.title: Sancho made 'a scapegoat' after being dropped

articles.description: Coco Gauff shows why she is one the favourites at the US Open with a gutsy win over Caroline Wozniacki to reach the quarter-finals.
articles.title: Gauff underlines title credentials with gutsy Wozniacki win

articles.description: Which players impressed our football pundit Garth Crooks enough to make his latest Team of the Week?
articles.title: Who is proving a captain fantastic? - Garth Crooks' Team of the Week

articles.description: Liverpool could be bracing themselves for more bids for Mohamed Salah this week but Jurgen Klopp is "calm despite the fuss" about the forward's future.
articles.title: Klopp 'calm despite fuss' over Salah's future

articles.description: BBC Sport Scotland chief sportswriter Tom English analyses Celtic's win in the first Scottish Premiership Old Firm game of the season.
articles.title: 'Kyogo conundrum continues to puzzle Rangers in Old Firm defeat'

articles.description: Watch the best shots from New Zealand opener Finn Allen as his score of 83 inspires New Zealand to a 74-run win over England at Edgbaston.
articles.title: Allen masterclass inspires New Zealand's 74-run victory
